article_title: What If The Supreme Court Drops A Bombshell On Obamacare?

article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman

og.description: The Supreme Court case King v. Burwell will determine whether the IRS overstepped in saying (Obamacare) subsidies are available for health insurance bought through the federal exchange.If the administration loses the case, more than half the states will lose an estimated $65 million in subsidies and an estimated 4 million people will [...]
